attributes.action: Change the name of Black Friday Sales to Bargain Friday Sales
attributes.additional_details: I am from a dual heritage  family family's owever I hate to see and hear the mentioning of black Friday and I am yet to meet another black person who doesn't  find it offensive
attributes.background: I want the labelling of black Friday removed it is discriminating and to all the slaves of the black history

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding which words people can use.
